familyMemberEthics.description: Former secretary/president/director of VH Property Corp. (Trump National Golf Club - Los Angeles), in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. In 2017, Pres. Trump earned $11,644,421 (golf related revenue) and $9,275,000 (land sales) in golf related revenue and land sales income from TRUMP NATIONAL GOLF CLUB - LOS ANGELES, valued at Over $50,000,000. Underlying Assets: golf course and unsold lots. Location: Los Angeles, CA. See attached schedule.
